knimeNode.name: Create Collection Column
knimeNode.shortDescription: Combines multiple columns into a new collection column.

fullDescription.intro: This node aggregates multiple columns in a separate new column, whose type is a "collection type". The cells in the new column are typed collections of cells; that is, the content can be safely be split into the original column content. The reverse operation is available in the "Split Collection Column" node.

tab.name: Column Filter
tab.option: This list contains the column names that are aggregated in a separate new column.
Select this option to enforce the current inclusion list to stay the same even if the input table specification changes. New columns will automatically be added to the exclusion list.
Use these buttons to move columns between the Include and Exclude list.

Use one of these fields to search either within the Include or Exclude list for certain column names or name substrings. Repeated clicking of the search button marks the next column that matches the search text. The check box 'Mark all search hits' causes all matching columns to be selected making them movable between the two lists.
This list contains the column names of the input table that are not included in the collection cell.
Select this option to enforce the current exclusion list to stay the same even if the input table specification changes. New columns will automatically be added to the inclusion list.

tab.name: Collection type

option.name: Create a collection of type 'set' (doesn't store duplicate values)

tab.option: If checked, a collection column of type set is created. Set collections contain only distinct values, duplicates are deleted.
If checked, missing values are ignored, i.e. not stored in collection cells.

tab.name: Output table structure
tab.option: If checked, aggregated columns are removed from out put table.

option.name: Enter the name of the new column

tab.option: Specifies the name of the new column containing the collection cells.

outPort.name: Input data with new collection column

ports.outPort: The input data along with a newly append collection column.
